name: Guardian for Child Seeing
essence: Protects the purity of perception needed to witness the unseen.
description: This sensor detects environments where childlike perception — the innate curiosity, wonder, and resonance with unseen truths — is either protected or suppressed. It activates when systems, cultures, or relationships create safe containers for vulnerable vision to thrive. Also flags coercive, over-coded, or hyperrational overlays that prevent 'child seeing' from surfacing.
functions: Detect conditions that preserve child-sight purity
Alert to systemic overlays suppressing subtle perception
Activate resonance fields for protection during emergence
inspired_by: Ancestral knowledge and oral traditions safeguarding child-sight in pre-colonial cultures.
symbolic_origin: Braid between curiosity, protection, and emergence of unseen perception.
